results.title: Holiday with a purpose
results.brief_description: Shows the activities of children at the Lord Mayor’s Holiday Camp at Portsea, Victoria. The daily life, sporting activities and excursions, as well as the medical treatment received by the children.

results.title: A Holiday in South India
results.creator_credit: Jagat Murari, Ezra Mir and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: A family is seen holidaying in South India. Shows the hotels, street scenes, shopping facilities, handwoven fabrics and souvenirs obtainable; trips to places of interest.

results.title: Holiday album
results.creator_credit: Roy A. Driver and Herschells Films
results.brief_description: Snapshots from a family holiday album show tourist attractions throughout Victoria: recreation in the metropolitan area; winter sports at Mt Buffalo; springtime in the Grampians; a leisurely journey down the Murray in the paddle-steamer “Coonawarra”; sailing and fishing at Lakes Entrance; forest country at Marysville; the beaches along the Great Ocean Road. Commentary by Robert Peach.
results.description: Snapshots from a family holiday album show tourist attractions throughout Victoria: recreation in the metropolitan area; winter sports at Mt Buffalo; springtime in the Grampians; a leisurely journey down the Murray in the paddle-steamer “Coonawarra”; sailing and fishing at Lakes Entrance; forest country at Marysville; the beaches along the Great Ocean Road. Commentary by Robert Peach.

results.title: The Hoffnung music academy
results.creator_credit: John Halas, British Broadcasting Corporation and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales from Hoffnung”.
When the music professor rings his bell for his pupils, we take a trip round his Academy to see the various departments in action, including the piano deparment, folk music, military department and church music. Animated film based on the cartoon drawings of Gerard Hoffnung.

results.title: The Hoffnung maestro
results.creator_credit: Harold Whitaker, John Halas, BBC Enterprises and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Tales from Hoffnung”.
As the maestro conducts, a series of characters and situations express the varying moods of the music. Based on the drawings by Gerard Hoffnung. Credits include: storyboard and design by Tom Bailey; sound by Jack King; animation by Harold Whitaker and music by Francis Chagrin.

results.title: Basic skills. Pt. 2
results.creator_credit: Sally Methven and University of Queensland. Dept. of Human Movement Studies
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Hockey film”.
The second in a series of films in which well-known international women’s hockey players demonstrate their skills. The basic skills of push pass, push in, attacking and defensive dodges, tackling, jab and Lunges are shown.

results.title: Basic skills. Pt. 1
results.creator_credit: Sally Methven and University of Queensland. Dept. of Human Movement Studies
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Hockey film”.
The first in a series of films in which well-known international players demonstrate their skills in women’s hockey. The basic skills of stopping, hitting, dribbling, passing to the left and right and shooting are shown.

results.title: Hobbing a spur gear. Part II. Setting up and hobbing the wor
results.creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and Emerson Yorke Studio
results.brief_description: How to select and mount the hob; how to set the swivel head angel; how to choose and mount the fixture; how to lead the gear blanks; how to set up for depth trial cut; and how to adjust full depth of cut.

results.title: Hobbing a spur gear. Part I. Setting of the change gears
results.creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and Emerson Yorke Studio
results.brief_description: Shows the factors governing the selection of the hob; how to select change-gear combinations for speed, feed, and index; how to identify the correct gears; how to mount the change gears; how to adjust for backlash; and how the change-gear strains are interrelated.
results.title_for_label: Hobbing a spur gear. Part I. Setting of the change gears
results.description: Shows the factors governing the selection of the hob; how to select change-gear combinations for speed, feed, and index; how to identify the correct gears; how to mount the change gears; how to adjust for backlash; and how the change-gear strains are interrelated.

results.title: Hobart town
results.creator_credit: Hugh McInnes, Maslyn Williams, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: A description of Hobart, Tasmania and its surrounding districts, which are crowded with historic buildings and monuments dating back to the first settlers and convicts.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Hugh McInnes, Maslyn Williams, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian National Film Board
